articles.author: Zeke Miller and Josh Boak
articles.title: U.S., EU reach agreement to settle rift over Trump-era steel and aluminum tariffs - CTV News
articles.description: The U.S. and European Union have reached an agreement to settle their diplomatic rift over Trump-era steel and aluminum tariffs, the White House announced Saturday, as President Joe Biden is in Rome attending the Group of 20 summit.
articles.content:

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Tze Yong shows he's no easy meat in Europe - The Star Online
articles.description: PETALING JAYA:  Youngster Ng Tze Yong continues to show that he has plenty in his tank as he marched into the men’s singles final in the Belgian International in Leuven on Friday after defeating Japan’s Yusuke Onodera 20-22, 21-15, 23-21.
articles.content:
PETALING JAYA: Two finals in two weeks.

articles.title: U.S. reaches deal with European Union over steel and aluminum tariffs - NPR
articles.description: Announced at the G-20 Summit in Rome, the deal is meant to protect American producers but tamp down on the cost increases that the original tariffs have led to.

articles.title: International opposition mounts over proposed U.S. EV tax credit - Reuters
articles.description: The European Union, Germany, Canada, Japan, Mexico, France, South Korea, Italy and other countries wrote U.S. lawmakers saying a proposed U.S. electric vehicle tax credit violates international trade rules, according to a joint letter made public Saturday.
